mapper.select: SELECT store_tbl.*, GROUP_CONCAT(menu_tbl.menuName) AS menuNames FROM store_tbl JOIN menu_tbl ON store_tbl.storeCode = menu_tbl.storeCode WHERE REPLACE(LOWER(store_tbl.storeName), ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(LOWER(#{searchTerm}), ' ', ''), '%') OR REPLACE(LOWER(menu_tbl.menuName), ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(LOWER(#{searchTerm}), ' ', ''), '%') GROUP BY store_tbl.storeCode, store_tbl.storeName, store_tbl.storeStatus ORDER BY store_tbl.storeStatus;
